name: Feature request
about: Suggest an idea or improvement
---

## Summary

What you want and why it helps.

## Proposed Solution

Outline of the change/API/behavior. Include any VTL syntax, API signatures, or CLI entrypoints you expect.

## Alternatives Considered

Other approaches you thought about.

## Additional Context

References, links, or examples. Note required data inputs/outputs (datasets, value domains, external routines) if relevant.
